column3: She sees them walking in a straight line,, that's not really her style
column4: They all got the same heartbeat,, but hers is falling behind
column5: Nothing in this world could ever bring them down
column6: Yeah,, they're invincible and she's just in the background
column10: I wish that I could be like the cool kids cuz all the cool kids,, they seem to fit in
column11: I wish that I could be like the cool kids,, like the cool kids
column14: He sees them talking with a big smile,, but they haven't got a clue
column15: Yeah,, they're living the good life,, can't see what he is going through
column16: They're driving fast cars,, but they don't know where they're going
column17: In the fast lane,, living life without knowing
